results.title: Client and Marketing Coordinator
results.description: Job Description SUMMARY Young, growing and energetic CPA and financial advisory firm is looking for an out-going, service driven Client and Marketing coordinator to add to our amazing team. In this position, you will provide administrative support by assisting the firm with client relations and the execution of our marketing strategy. You will also be a main contact point for clients to insure our clients and prospects receive outstanding client service. RESPONSIBILITIES/DUTIES: Coordinate with…

results.title: Marketing Data Specialist
results.description: Job Description Support strategic campaign planning activities including acquisition and redemption forecasting Develop campaign performance reporting and analysis Generate detailed campaign/operational reports/analyses including leading all ad hoc analysis Audit identify, and optimize campaign strategies and other factors impacting program performance Identify trends, issues, gaps, and performance improvement opportunities Experience with relational databases Company Description Headquartered …

results.title: CAD-Cutting Trainee
results.description: Job Description Have you ever wondered how different names and numbers are printed onto the shirts of sports teams and major brands all over the world? It's Cad-Cut Vinyl A successful imaging and large scale media company seeks a sharp recent college grad for a full time paid trainee position to learn how to operate a CAD vinyl cutter. Responsibilities: Learn how to operate a CAD vinyl cutter to cut out letters and designs from vinyl materials Using computer skills to program the machine Using …

company.display_name: Advertising/Imaging and Large Scale Media Company

results.description: Job Description FPGA Designer FPGA design experience with board-level product commercialization experience Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Electrical Engineering Demonstrated strong VHDL and/or Verilog skills; logical and physical design, timing closure design of complex, dense design with Xilinx FPGA design flow and simulation tools High-speed (GHz) serial and DDR3 implementations Familiarity with high-speed (GHz) PCB design techniques design of data-intensive architectures and functional b…
results.title: FPGA Design Engineer
Account Manager
results.description: Job Description The Account Manager position will be responsible for daily contact with Automotive OEM's and assure their satisfaction. Automotive experience is a must. The position will be responsible for select customers and programs and the Account Manager will be the liaison between our client (a Tier One Automotive components manufacturer) and the customer in all matters pertaining to the product in question. RESPONSIBILITIES: Review and communicate data for RFQ's Prepare customer quotatio…

Job Description Are you a ROCKSTAR Advertising Media Supervisor ready to take on your next big challenge? Our leading global technology client has your dream job waiting for you As our client’s new Media Supervisor, you will be responsible for growing an in house media team – developing their skills, evaluating their performance and managing their growth. You will be focusing heavily on our client’s digital and broadcast management as well as playing an integral part in the media planning and b…
results.title: Media Planning Supervisor
Ecommerce Sales & Marketing Director
results.description: Job Description Growing Consumer Durables Company In Chicago is adding leadership talent to their team now The Ecommerce Sales & Marketing Director Manager is responsible for growing online sales & profitability focusing primarily on website merchandising and marketing activities. Primary responsibilities include: Strategy Development, Merchandising, New Product Development, Product Commercialization, Inventory Planning and Forecasting, Social Media Planning, Key Account Management, Budgeting, …

results.title: Hospitality / Food Industry / Retail / Restaurant - Full Time
results.description: Job Description Hospitality / Food Industry / Retail / Restaurant - Full Time We are looking for candidates with experience in the retail - hospitality and restaurant / food service industry for the full time account manager position. Do you strive for every customer to have an over the top experience? Do you set challenging goals and push yourself to attain those with a no matter what mentality? Do you thrive in a team environment to help others hit their goals? We are a privately owned market…

results.title: Marketing Representative
results.description: Job Description AHI Supply is looking for a Marketing Representative who wants to jump in head-first and help continue to grow AHI’s product knowledge to existing customers and potential clients. You will directly contribute to improving our marking department by presenting marketing materials at conferences and trade shows, help write and design company brochures, flyers, promotional items, etc. In addition, you will organize activities to raise awareness of the company’s products and conduct …
